info: As a Freelancer, developed and/or launched various cloud-native web applications for different clients/projects

projects.title: Trimbel® — cloud-native platform for car dealerships to manage their inventory and sales
contributions: Setting up the cloud infrastructure (Azure) and CI/CD pipeline (Azure DevOps) for the platform with Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform).

projects.title: Talos — cloud-native ecosystem of distributed, event-driven apps handling regulatory reporting of ACT’s trading activities
contributions: Monitored and optimized reporting functions ensuring accurate and compliant daily trade activity submissions.
Added automations to reporting workflows, further reducing operational workload and manual intervention from engineers.
Investigated and corrected inaccurate historical reports, enhancing data integrity and regulatory compliance.

projects.title: AIM® — cloud-native multi-tenant web application (SaaS) for AI-driven well trajectory optimization and planning
contributions: Repaired REST API server’s long broken data import and export endpoints and improved data models.
Decoupled backend optimization (micro)services from databases to ease workload of algorithm developers.

projects.title: DashWise® — cloud-native multi-tenant web application (SaaS) presenting real-time financial dashboard for start-ups / scale-ups
contributions: Architected application's full stack i.e. frontend, backend (REST API), database, cloud infrastructure and launched MVP.
Created CI/CD pipeline from ground up, including testing, automated workflows, infrastructure-as-code, and deployment.
Built user authentication system using OpenID Connect, OAuth2.0, JWT and designed role-based access control (RBAC).
Built automated ETL pipeline drawing client data (from Exact Online API to BigQuery) to create financial dashboard data.
Set up and lead teams's Agile/Scrum ceremonies with automated workflows (ClickUp) and communication channels (Slack).

projects.title: CamDirector® — AI-driven multiple camera system for automated lecture recordings with 'teacher tracking'
contributions: Developed CamDirector from early prototype to MVP launch through iterative field testing and user feedback.
Refactored code extensively to create clean, modular and decoupled software architecture and optimized tracking algorithms.
Completely revamped CamDirector’s server-side rendered (SSR) application and improved UX design for MVP launch.
Performed code reviews and tutoring juniors on software engineering best practices (Clean Code, SOLID principles etc.).
Improved team’s Agile / Scrum incl. setting up project management workflows and automations, and leading ceremonies.

projects.title: FLS Localization — Onboard localization system for ship-hull-cleaning robot based on Forward Looking Sonar (FLS) images
contributions: Delivered Proof-of-Concept for automated localization system enabling centimeter-level accuracy, including image filtering & processing, quay wall detection, target tracking and sensor data fusion (i.e. Extended Kalman Filter).
